mapper.select:
SELECT * FROM ( SELECT srna.id AS id, ssm.SIM_CART_NUMBER AS sim_card, ssm.iccid AS iccid, srna.authentication_result AS authentication_result, srna.vin AS vin, stmu.serial_number AS serial_number, sop.owner_name AS owner_name, sop.owner_cert_id AS owner_cert_id, sop.mobile_phone AS mobile_phone, sop.sex AS sex, srna.remarks AS remarks, '1' AS category, srna.UPDATE_TIME as update_time FROM `sys_real_name_authentication` AS srna LEFT JOIN sys_owner_people AS sop ON sop.id = srna.AUTHENTICATION_ID LEFT JOIN sys_vehicle AS sv ON srna.vin = sv.vin LEFT JOIN sys_term_model_unit AS stmu ON stmu.id = sv.term_id AND stmu.delete_flag = 1 LEFT JOIN sys_sim_management AS ssm ON ssm.iccid = stmu.iccid AND ssm.delete_type = 1 WHERE srna.AUTHENTICATION_TYPE = 1 AND sop.OWNER_TYPE = 4 UNION ALL SELECT ID AS id, SIM_CART_NUMBER AS sim_card, ICCID AS iccid, '0' AS authentication_result, VIN AS vin, SERIAL_NUMBER AS serial_number, OWNER_NAME AS owner_name, OWNER_CERT_ID AS owner_cert_id, MOBILE_PHONE AS mobile_phone, SEX AS sex, '' AS remarks, '2' AS category, UPDATE_TIME as update_time FROM sys_authentication_personal_temp AS sapt ) AS tab WHERE 1 = 1
and iccid like concat('%',#{iccid},'%' )
and sim_card like concat('%',#{sim_card},'%' )
and authentication_result = #{authentication_result}
and vin like concat('%',#{vin},'%' )
and serial_number like concat('%',#{serial_number},'%' )
and owner_name like concat('%',#{owner_name},'%' )
and owner_cert_id like concat('%',#{owner_cert_id},'%' )
and mobile_phone like concat('%',#{mobile_phone},'%' )
ORDER BY update_time DESC

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT srna.id, stmu.sim_card AS sim_cart_number, stmu.iccid, srna.vin, stmu.serial_number, sop.owner_name, sop.owner_cert_id, sop.owner_cert_type, sop.owner_cert_addr, sop.mobile_phone, sop.address, sop.email, stmu.imei, ssm.imsi, srna.CREATE_TIME, srna.UPDATE_TIME, sop.sex, srna.CREATE_USER_ID, srna.UPDATE_USER_ID, sop.pic1, sop.pic2, sop.face_pic, srna.AUTHENTICATION_RESULT, srna.REMARKS, srna.line_name_en, srna.channel_id FROM `sys_real_name_authentication` AS srna LEFT JOIN sys_owner_people AS sop ON sop.id = srna.AUTHENTICATION_ID LEFT JOIN sys_vehicle AS sv ON srna.vin = sv.vin LEFT JOIN sys_term_model_unit AS stmu ON stmu.id = sv.term_id AND stmu.delete_flag = 1 LEFT JOIN sys_sim_management AS ssm ON ssm.iccid = stmu.iccid AND ssm.delete_type = 1 WHERE srna.AUTHENTICATION_TYPE = 1 AND sop.OWNER_TYPE = 4 UNION ALL SELECT ID, SIM_CART_NUMBER, ICCID, VIN, SERIAL_NUMBER, OWNER_NAME, OWNER_CERT_ID, OWNER_CERT_TYPE, OWNER_CERT_ADDR, MOBILE_PHONE, ADDRESS, EMAIL, IMEI, IMSI, CREATE_TIME, UPDATE_TIME, SEX, CREATE_USER_ID, UPDATE_USER_ID, pic1, pic2, FACE_PIC, '0', '', line_name_en, channel_id FROM sys_authentication_personal_temp AS sapt ) AS tab where ID = #{id}
SELECT COUNT(*) AS num FROM `sys_owner_people` where owner_cert_id = #{OWNER_CERT_ID}

SELECT COUNT(*) AS num FROM `sys_real_name_authentication` AS srna LEFT JOIN sys_owner_people AS sop ON srna.AUTHENTICATION_ID = sop.id WHERE srna.AUTHENTICATION_TYPE = 1 AND AUTHENTICATION_RESULT IN (1, 2) AND OWNER_CERT_ID=#{OWNER_CERT_ID}
mapper.sql: ID, CREATE_TIME, OWNER_NAME, SEX, OWNER_CERT_TYPE, OWNER_CERT_ID, OWNER_CERT_ADDR, MOBILE_PHONE, EMAIL, VIN, SERIAL_NUMBER, IMEI, SIM_CART_NUMBER, ICCID, IMSI, CREATE_USER_ID, UPDATE_USER_ID, UPDATE_TIME, line_name_en, channel_id
mapper.insert: insert into sys_authentication_personal_temp (ID, CREATE_TIME, OWNER_NAME, SEX, OWNER_CERT_TYPE, OWNER_CERT_ID, OWNER_CERT_ADDR, MOBILE_PHONE, ADDRESS, EMAIL, VIN, SERIAL_NUMBER, IMEI, SIM_CART_NUMBER, ICCID, IMSI, CREATE_USER_ID, UPDATE_USER_ID, UPDATE_TIME, PIC1, PIC2, FACE_PIC, line_name_en, channel_id ) values (#{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{ownerName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sex,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{ownerCertType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{ownerCertId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{ownerCertAddr,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{mobilePhone,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{address,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{email,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{vin,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{serialNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{imei,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{simCartNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{iccid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{imsi,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createUserId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{updateUserId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{updateTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{pic1,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR}, #{pic2,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR}, #{facePic,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR}, #{lineNameEn,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR}, #{channelId,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR} )

insert into sys_authentication_personal_temp
ID,
CREATE_TIME,
OWNER_NAME,
SEX,
OWNER_CERT_TYPE,
OWNER_CERT_ID,
OWNER_CERT_ADDR,

ICCID,
IMSI,
CREATE_USER_ID,

UPDATE_TIME,
PIC1,
PIC2,
FACE_PIC,
line_name_en,
channel_id,

mapper.update:
update sys_authentication_personal_temp
CREATE_TIME = #{createTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
OWNER_NAME = #{ownerName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
SEX = #{sex,jdbcType=CHAR},
OWNER_CERT_TYPE = #{ownerCertType,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
OWNER_CERT_ID = #{ownerCertId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
OWNER_CERT_ADDR = #{ownerCertAddr,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
MOBILE_PHONE = #{mobilePhone,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ADDRESS = #{address,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
EMAIL = #{email,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
VIN = #{vin,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
SERIAL_NUMBER = #{serialNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
IMEI = #{imei,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
SIM_CART_NUMBER = #{simCartNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ICCID = #{iccid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
IMSI = #{imsi,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CREATE_USER_ID = #{createUserId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
UPDATE_USER_ID = #{updateUserId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
UPDATE_TIME = #{updateTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PIC1 = #{pic1,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR},
PIC2 = #{pic2,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR},
FACE_PIC = #{facePic,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR},
ADDRESS = #{address,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR},
line_name_en=#{lineNameEn,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR},
channel_id=#{channelId,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR},
where ID = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

update sys_authentication_personal_temp set CREATE_TIME = #{createTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, OWNER_NAME = #{ownerName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SEX = #{sex,jdbcType=CHAR}, OWNER_CERT_TYPE = #{ownerCertType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, OWNER_CERT_ID = #{ownerCertId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, OWNER_CERT_ADDR = #{ownerCertAddr,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, MOBILE_PHONE = #{mobilePhone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ADDRESS = #{address,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, EMAIL = #{email,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, VIN = #{vin,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SERIAL_NUMBER = #{serialNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, IMEI = #{imei,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SIM_CART_NUMBER = #{simCartNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ICCID = #{iccid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, IMSI = #{imsi,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CREATE_USER_ID = #{createUserId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, UPDATE_USER_ID = #{updateUserId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, UPDATE_TIME = #{updateTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PIC1 = #{pic1,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR}, PIC2 = #{pic2,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR}, FACE_PIC = #{facePic,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR}, line_name_en=#{lineNameEn,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR}, channel_id=#{channelId,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR} where ID = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

update sys_authentication_personal_temp set CREATE_TIME = #{createTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, OWNER_NAME = #{ownerName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SEX = #{sex,jdbcType=CHAR}, OWNER_CERT_TYPE = #{ownerCertType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, OWNER_CERT_ID = #{ownerCertId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, OWNER_CERT_ADDR = #{ownerCertAddr,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, MOBILE_PHONE = #{mobilePhone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, EMAIL = #{email,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, VIN = #{vin,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SERIAL_NUMBER = #{serialNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, IMEI = #{imei,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SIM_CART_NUMBER = #{simCartNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ICCID = #{iccid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, IMSI = #{imsi,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CREATE_USER_ID = #{createUserId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, UPDATE_USER_ID = #{updateUserId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, UPDATE_TIME = #{updateTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PIC1 = #{pic1,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR}, PIC2 = #{pic2,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR}, FACE_PIC = #{facePic,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR}, line_name_en=#{lineNameEn,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR}, channel_id=#{channelId,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR} where ID = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
